INSERT INTO `message_code` (`code`, `title`, `content`, `description`, `module`, `deleted`, `created_at`) VALUES ('10007', 'GoTasty Login Message', '*Login Message* 

Member ID: %%member_id%%
Type: %%type%%
Phone Number: %%phone%%
Date: %%currentDate%%
Time: %%currentTime%%', 'Triggers when member login GoTasty.', 'Standard Platform', '0', '0000-00-00 00:00:00');

INSERT INTO `message_code` (`code`, `title`, `content`, `description`, `module`, `deleted`, `created_at`) VALUES ('10008', 'GoTasty Reset Password Message', '*Reset Password Message* 

Client ID: %%clientID%%
Phone Number: %%phone%%
Date: %%currentDate%%
Time: %%currentTime%%', 'Triggers when member reset password GoTasty.', 'Standard Platform', '0', '0000-00-00 00:00:00');

INSERT INTO `message_code` (`code`, `title`, `content`, `description`, `module`, `deleted`, `created_at`) VALUES ('10009', 'GoTasty OTP Request Message', '*OTP Request* 

Phone : %%otpParams%%
Send Type: phone
OTP Code: %%otpRes%%
Date: %%currentDate%%
Time: %%currentTime%%', 'Triggers when member send OTP request GoTasty.', 'Standard Platform', '0', '0000-00-00 00:00:00');

INSERT INTO `message_code` (`code`, `title`, `content`, `description`, `module`, `deleted`, `created_at`) VALUES ('10010', 'GoTasty Failed to Update User Existing profile Message', '*Failed to Update User Existing profile* 

Client Phone No: %%phoneNumber%%
Address: %%address%%
Country ID: %%countryID%%
State ID: %%stateID%%
City ID: %%cityID%%
Date: %%currentDate%%
Time: %%currentTime%%', 'Triggers when member failed to update profile GoTasty.', 'Standard Platform', '0', '0000-00-00 00:00:00');

INSERT INTO `message_code` (`code`, `title`, `content`, `description`, `module`, `deleted`, `created_at`) VALUES ('10011', 'GoTasty Failed to register new guest Message', '*Failed to register new guest Message* 

Member ID: %%memberID%%
Name: %%$name%%
Type: Guest
Phone Number: +%%phoneNumber%%
Date: %%currentDate%%
Time: %%currentTime%%', 'Triggers when failed to register guest GoTasty.', 'Standard Platform', '0', '0000-00-00 00:00:00');

INSERT INTO `message_code` (`code`, `title`, `content`, `description`, `module`, `deleted`, `created_at`) VALUES ('10012', 'GoTasty Register New guest Message', '*Register New guest Message* 

Member ID: %%memberID%%
Name: %%name%%
Type: Guest
Phone Number: +%%phoneNumber%%
Date: %%currentDate%%
Time: %%currentTime%%', 'Triggers when register new guest GoTasty.', 'Standard Platform', '0', '0000-00-00 00:00:00');

INSERT INTO `message_code` (`code`, `title`, `content`, `description`, `module`, `deleted`, `created_at`) VALUES ('10013', 'GoTasty Register Issue Message', '*Register Issue* 

Error Type: %%errorType%%
Error Message: %%errorMessage%%
Type: %%type%%
Phone Number: %%phoneNumber%%
Date: %%currentDate%%
Time: %%currentTime%%', 'Triggers when member register issue GoTasty.', 'Standard Platform', '0', '0000-00-00 00:00:00');

INSERT INTO `message_code` (`code`, `title`, `content`, `description`, `module`, `deleted`, `created_at`) VALUES ('10014', 'GoTasty Register Message', '*Register Message* 

Member ID: %%memberID%%
Type: Client
Phone Number: +%%phoneNumber%%
Referral ID: %%sponsorID%%
Referral Name: %%sponsorName%%
Referral Phone No: +%%sponsorPhone%%
Date: %%currentDate%%
Time: %%currentTime%%', 'Triggers when member register new account GoTasty.', 'Standard Platform', '0', '0000-00-00 00:00:00');
